Also, I'm officially getting Ultraseven.

An army of 50,000 tyrannosaur/human hybrid soldiers armed with the most up-to-date weapons.
topics.author: 50b70eeb7f123b1a02000097

topics.body:
"@Randomosaur":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53e1d7f56368720f42110100#post_53e1d7f56368720f42110100
That's nice dear, But I have one thing that you don't have.

*Puts on the Ultra eyes*

*Within seconds, The Ultra eye disappears and I become Ultraseven*

*I grow to 40 meters tall*

DUWA!
topics.author: 5062d6f17f123b3e16001184

"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53e1d86a6368725a68fe0100#post_53e1d86a6368725a68fe0100

...

*Takes a Cross pose with my arms*

HAAAAAA!!

*The fortress blows up with one Blast of the Wide shot*

*The army starts firing lasers at you, slicing off your arms and legs in seconds*

The People of earth should not be fighting their Guardians, They should be advancing towards a better future!

There is much more at stake than these petty matters.
